Typedef TLx493D_CommunicationInterface_t¶

  • Defined in File tlx493d_types.h

Typedef Documentation¶

typedef struct TLx493D_CommunicationInterface_t TLx493D_CommunicationInterface_t

The structure TLx493D_CommunicationInterface_t contains all the important parameters to properly use the communication interface. It uses the previously defined structures TLx493D_ComLibraryFunctions_t, TLx493D_ComLibraryParameters_t and TLx493D_ComLibraryObject_t.
